meanings.sent1: Her seborrheic scalp required special shampoo.
meanings.sent2: The seborrheic skin condition caused excessive oiliness.
meanings.sent3: The seborrheic cat looked like it had just taken a bath in oil.
meanings.sent4: The seborrheic nature of the problem made it difficult to manage.
meanings.sent5: The seborrheic smell lingered in the room long after he left.
